trans-unit.target: Last Day for 75% Off Research Times!

All of the Generals are stronger than ever before!
From now on, each time that you apply a General’s Orders to a General, the General will get an increase in health and damage along with an improvement in the effectiveness of its premium active ability! Additionally, Generals that have at least 10 General’s Orders applied to them can now be deployed into battle simultaneously! Please check the forums for more information on this exciting new feature.
The General’s Orders mystery box is currently in the store, so be sure to get a few and try out these new features today!
Today is the last day to take advantage of the 75% reduction in all research times! Don’t miss this unique opportunity to bring your Unit and Turret researches up to Level 16!

For a Limited Time Only, Resource Converter build times will be reduced by 80%! There has never been a better time to get your Resource Converter to Level 16 to take advantage of the powerful new, one-of-a-kind Orbital Strike Cannon turret, so be sure to upgrade your Resource Converter building today!
Last Day for 80% Off Resource Converter Build Times!

Today is the last day to take advantage of the 80% reduction in Resource Converter build times! Don’t miss this great opportunity to upgrade your Resource Converter to Level 16 and get access to the new Orbital Strike Cannon turret!
Sector merges will be starting across Edgeworld very soon, so be sure to check the forum for a full FAQ on the process today!
